languages.text: "Я..." {n}Ирлиэт осекается.{/n} "Я забыла о своем пути. Забыла, что значит полагаться на собственные суждения. Элантах, ты прав{mf||а}. Я видела слишком много признаков того, что над Лилэтан нависла иная угроза, нежели чем мон-кай".

traits.locale_text: "Я..." {n}Ирлиэт осекается.{/n} "Я забыла о своем пути. Забыла, что значит полагаться на собственные суждения. Эл'антар, ты прав{mf||а}. Я видела слишком много признаков того, что над Лилэтан нависла иная угроза, нежели чем мон-кай".

languages.text: "I..." {n}Yrliet breaks off.{/n} "I had forgotten my own path. I had forgotten what it means to trust my own judgement. Elantach, you are right. I have seen too many signs to deny it — there is a threat hanging over the Lilaethan, and it is not from the mon-keigh."
languages.original_text: "Я..." {n}Ирлиэт осекается.{/n} "Я забыла о своем пути. Забыла, что значит полагаться на собственные суждения. Элантах, ты прав{mf||а}. Я видела слишком много признаков того, что над Лилэтан нависла иная угроза, нежели чем мон-кай".

traits.locale_text: "I..." {n}Yrliet breaks off.{/n} "I had forgotten my own path. I had forgotten what it means to trust my own judgment. El'antar, you are right. I have seen too many signs to deny it — there is a threat hanging over the Lilaethan, and it is not from the mon-keigh."

"I..." {n}Yrliet breaks off.{/n} "I had forgotten my own path. I had forgotten what it means to trust my own judgment. El'antar, you are right. I have seen too many signs to deny it — there is a threat hanging over the Lilaethan, and it is not from the mon-keigh."

"I..." {n}Yrliet breaks off.{/n} "I had forgotten my own path. I had forgotten what it means to trust my own judgment. El'antar, you are right. I have seen too many signs to deny it — there is a threat hanging over the Lilaethan, and it is not from the mon-keigh."

"I..." {n}Yrliet breaks off.{/n} "I had forgotten my own path. I had forgotten what it means to trust my own judgement. Elantach, you are right. I have seen too many signs to deny it — there is a threat hanging over the Lilaethan, and it is not from the mon-keigh."

languages.text: “我……”{n}伊莉耶特顿了顿。{/n}“我已经忘记了我自己的道途，忘记了什么叫做相信自己的判断。你说得没错，外界人。我已经看到了太多迹象。我无法否认，莉莱赞正在遭受某种威胁，而且这不是来自猴子的威胁。”
languages.original_text: "I..." {n}Yrliet breaks off.{/n} "I had forgotten my own path. I had forgotten what it means to trust my own judgement. Elantach, you are right. I have seen too many signs to deny it — there is a threat hanging over the Lilaethan, and it is not from the mon-keigh."

traits.locale_text: “我……”{n}伊莉耶特顿了顿。{/n}“我已经忘记了我自己的道途，忘记了什么叫做相信自己的判断。你说得没错，外界人。我已经看到了太多迹象。我无法否认，莉莱赞正在遭受某种威胁，而且这不是来自猴子的威胁。”

languages.text: 「我は…」{n}ユリエットが絶句する。{/n}「我は自分自身の道を忘れていた。自分の判断を信じる意味を忘れていた。エランタ、お前の言うとおりだ。我は否定できないくらい、あまりに多くの徴候を見てきた。リラエタンには脅威が差し迫っているが、それはモン＝ケイのせいではない」
languages.original_text: "I..." {n}Yrliet breaks off.{/n} "I had forgotten my own path. I had forgotten what it means to trust my own judgement. Elantach, you are right. I have seen too many signs to deny it — there is a threat hanging over the Lilaethan, and it is not from the mon-keigh."

traits.locale_text: 「我は…」{n}ユリエットが絶句する。{/n}「我は自分自身の道を忘れていた。自分の判断を信じる意味を忘れていた。エランタ、お前の言うとおりだ。我は否定できないくらい、あまりに多くの徴候を見てきた。リラエタンには脅威が差し迫っているが、それはモン＝ケイのせいではない」

languages.text: "Ich ..." {n}Yrliet bricht ab.{/n} "Ich hatte meinen eigenen Pfad vergessen. Ich hatte vergessen, auf mein eigenes Urteilsvermögen zu vertrauen. Elantach, Ihr habt recht. Ich habe zu viele Zeichen gesehen, um es zu leugnen – über Lileath hängt eine Bedrohung, und sie geht nicht von den Chem-Pan-Sey aus."
languages.original_text: "I..." {n}Yrliet breaks off.{/n} "I had forgotten my own path. I had forgotten what it means to trust my own judgement. Elantach, you are right. I have seen too many signs to deny it — there is a threat hanging over the Lilaethan, and it is not from the mon-keigh."

traits.locale_text: "Ich ..." {n}Yrliet bricht ab.{/n} "Ich hatte meinen eigenen Pfad vergessen. Ich hatte vergessen, auf mein eigenes Urteilsvermögen zu vertrauen. Elantach, Ihr habt recht. Ich habe zu viele Zeichen gesehen, um es zu leugnen – über Lileath hängt eine Bedrohung, und sie geht nicht von den Chem-Pan-Sey aus."

languages.text: « Je... » {n}Yrliet s'interrompt un instant.{/n} « J'avais oublié ma Voie. Je ne savais plus comment faire confiance à mon propre jugement. Elantach, vous avez raison. Les signes sont trop nombreux pour que je puisse continuer à les ignorer : une menace pèse sur la lilaethan, et elle n'émane pas des mon-keigh. »
languages.original_text: "I..." {n}Yrliet breaks off.{/n} "I had forgotten my own path. I had forgotten what it means to trust my own judgement. Elantach, you are right. I have seen too many signs to deny it — there is a threat hanging over the Lilaethan, and it is not from the mon-keigh."

traits.locale_text: « Je... » {n}Yrliet s'interrompt un instant.{/n} « J'avais oublié ma Voie. Je ne savais plus comment faire confiance à mon propre jugement. Elantach, vous avez raison. Les signes sont trop nombreux pour que je puisse continuer à les ignorer : une menace pèse sur la lilaethan, et elle n'émane pas des mon-keigh. »

languages.text: «Yo...». {n}Yrliet guarda silencio.{/n} «Había olvidado mi propio camino. Había olvidado lo que significaba confiar en mi propia opinión. Elantach, tienes razón. He visto demasiadas señales como para negarlo: algo amenaza al Lilaethan, y no son los mon-keigh».
languages.original_text: "I..." {n}Yrliet breaks off.{/n} "I had forgotten my own path. I had forgotten what it means to trust my own judgement. Elantach, you are right. I have seen too many signs to deny it — there is a threat hanging over the Lilaethan, and it is not from the mon-keigh."

traits.locale_text: «Yo...». {n}Yrliet guarda silencio.{/n} «Había olvidado mi propio camino. Había olvidado lo que significaba confiar en mi propia opinión. Elantach, tienes razón. He visto demasiadas señales como para negarlo: algo amenaza al Lilaethan, y no son los mon-keigh».

languages.text: "Ben..." {n}Yrliet'in lafı yarıda kalıyor.{/n} "Kendi çizdiğim yolu unutmuşum. Kendi muhakeme kabiliyetime güvenimi kaybetmişim. Haklı çıktın elantach. Gördüğüm alametlerden sonra bunu inkâr edemem: Lilaethan tehdit altında fakat bu tehdit, mon-keighlerden kaynaklanmıyor."
languages.original_text: "I..." {n}Yrliet breaks off.{/n} "I had forgotten my own path. I had forgotten what it means to trust my own judgement. Elantach, you are right. I have seen too many signs to deny it — there is a threat hanging over the Lilaethan, and it is not from the mon-keigh."

traits.locale_text: "Ben..." {n}Yrliet'in lafı yarıda kalıyor.{/n} "Kendi çizdiğim yolu unutmuşum. Kendi muhakeme kabiliyetime güvenimi kaybetmişim. Haklı çıktın elantach. Gördüğüm alametlerden sonra bunu inkâr edemem: Lilaethan tehdit altında fakat bu tehdit, mon-keighlerden kaynaklanmıyor."
